results.name: 1-limiting word of the mapping 00->1000, 10->010, starting with 00.
comment: Iterates of the mapping, starting with 00:
The 1-limiting word is the limit of the n-th iterates for n == 1 mod 3.
The number of letters (0's and 1's) in the n-th iterate is given by A288219(n), for n >= 0.
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: The first two n-th iterates for n == 1 mod 3:
xref: Cf. A288216 (0-limiting word), A288221, A288222, A288219, A288223 (2-limiting word).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 19 2017
